category.title: Demonstration (2 or more people - with or without permission)
category.description: A gathering of more than 2 people in a public place - with or without permission

category.title: Direct action (direct action, one location, deliberate law breaking)
category.description: Direct action taken in one location for the purposes of making a political point - without permission

category.title: Information giving/leafletting (distributing info, with/out permission)
category.description: One or more people handing out information -with or without permission

category.title: Occupation (public space/building, over a period of time)
category.description: Occupation of a public space, building or other place for a period of time
